It offers a nice view in the evenings. The fort is built in star shape. The fort closes at 5.30 in the evening. The tea served near the fort is too good.
A very beautiful fort atop a hillock on the Hassan Mangalore road about 5 km from sakleshpur. Wish this place was better maintained. Miscreants have defaced the walls.
A half KM climb up the steps to reach the fort. Fort is well maintained with security available all day long. The view from top of the hill is good.
